name: Spatial Void
description:
A twin-stick shooter game containing the unique ability to switch worlds. Play as a lone bandit seeking revenge upon those who took their home from them. Manage the two worlds to claim victory over the empire that destroyed your home world. Use the warp drive to survive while crushing your enemies.

Two worlds, one of machines and the other of flesh. Defeat the enemies of both flesh and machine to enact your revenge! When everything goes wrong, it is up to you to seek revenge among the stars. Can you claim victory against the empire? Play now and find out.
